section.title: Cron jobs
section.para: You can define cron jobs in your application. Via a cron job on th AppEngine you can access a URL according to a time pattern which is defined similar to the cron jobs on Unix. You define your cron jobs in a file "cron.xml" in the WEB-INF folder of you application.
This cron job will call the local website /count every minute.
You can check you cron jobs in the admin console.

para.tip: Please note that you should avoid running unnecessary cron jobs as this increases the load of the AppEngine.
